phases.title: Epic 2.5 Complete: User Data Rights & Restoration
features: Permanent Deletion Cron Job: Daily job at 2:00 AM UTC (9 PM EST) for 30-day expired accounts
Cron Endpoint: POST /api/cron/permanent-deletions with Bearer token auth
Tombstone Pattern: Preserves user_id/stripe_customer_id, NULLs PII (email, name, password, github_id)
Automatic Account Restoration: Email/password signup restores scheduled-deletion accounts
GitHub OAuth Restoration: GitHub sign-in restores scheduled-deletion accounts
Email Notifications: sendAccountDeletionEmail, sendAccountRestoredEmail via Resend
Data Retention: 7-year financial record retention, aggregate-then-delete usage analytics
GDPR/CCPA Compliance: Article 17 (Right to Erasure) + Article 17(3)(b) (Legal Obligation)
Database Migration 012: soft delete columns (deletion_scheduled_at, deleted_at, deletion_reason)
Database Migration 013: subscription retention (prevents CASCADE deletion)
Database Migration 014: usage analytics aggregation table
Settings ESC Handler: Fixed modal cancel behavior (checks for open modals before navigating)
Comprehensive Testing: 96+ tests (64 deletion/restoration, 32 cron/migrations)
2,225 tests (1,370 frontend, 855 backend, 100% pass rate)
